references.paper_title: Generative Modeling by Estimating Gradients of the Data Distribution
references.reason: This paper lays the theoretical foundation for score-based generative modeling, a crucial concept underlying the proposed DiffusionBlend method.

references.paper_title: Score-Based Generative Modeling through Stochastic Differential Equations
references.reason: This work provides a detailed framework for score-based generative modeling using stochastic differential equations, which is directly applied in the proposed approach.
This seminal paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, forming the core methodology upon which the proposed method builds.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Posterior Sampling for General Noisy Inverse Problems
references.reason: This paper extends the application of diffusion models to general inverse problems, providing a direct link to the medical image reconstruction problem addressed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Solving 3D Inverse Problems using Pre-trained 2D Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper tackles a related problem of 3D inverse problems, offering insights and approaches that inform the development of the DiffusionBlend methodology.
